00104 template <typename Tdata, /*typename Ttime,*/ typename Tacqu>
00105 int load_data(std::string file_name,std::vector<std::string> var_names,std::vector<std::string> &unit_names,std::vector<std::string> &dim_names,CImgList<Tdata> &channels,
00106   int &sampling_rate,
00107   Tacqu &acqu_range_min, Tacqu &acqu_range_max, std::string &acqu_range_unit,
00108   Tdata &phys_range_min, Tdata &phys_range_max, std::string &phys_range_unit)
00109 {
00110 std::cerr<<__FILE__<<"/"<<__func__<<"[data+attribute](\""<<file_name<<"\",...)"<<std::endl;
00112   load_data(file_name,var_names,unit_names,dim_names,channels);
00114   load_data_attribute(file_name,var_names[0],sampling_rate,acqu_range_min,acqu_range_max,acqu_range_unit,phys_range_min,phys_range_max,phys_range_unit);
00115   return 0;
00116 }

00132 template <typename Tdata, typename Ttime, typename Tacqu>
00133 int save_data(
00134   std::string file_name,
00135   cimg_library::CImgList<Tdata>& data,
00136   cimg_library::CImgList<Ttime>& time,
00137   DAQdevice DAQdev,
00138   std::string data_unit_name,
00139   Tacqu acqu_range_min, Tacqu acqu_range_max, std::string &acqu_range_unit,
00140   Tdata phys_range_min, Tdata phys_range_max, std::string &phys_range_unit
00141 )
00142 {
00143 //std::cerr<<__FILE__<<"/"<<__func__<<"(\""<<file_name<<"\",...)\n"<<std::flush;
00144 //data.print("data");
00145 //time.print("time");
00147   //NetCDF file objects for both data and time
00148   CImgListNetCDF<Tdata> fod;//e.g. "pressure", "hot_wire"
00149   CImgListNetCDF<Ttime> fot;//e.g. "time","pressure__time","hot_wire__time"
00150   //open NetCDF file
00151   fod.saveNetCDFFile((char*)file_name.c_str());
00152   //set NetCDF file object for time
00153   fot.setNetCDFFile(fod.getNetCDFFile());
00155   //std::cerr<<"create dimension\n"<<std::flush;
00156   //dimension name (only one here, as 1D data)
00157   std::vector<std::string> dim_names;
00159   dim_names.push_back("time");
00160   //create dimension
00161   fod.addNetCDFDims(data,dim_names);
00162   //set dimension for time
00163   fot.setNetCDFDims(fod.vpNCDim,fod.pNCDimt);
00165   //std::cerr<<"create variables\n"<<std::flush;
00166   NcFile *fp=fod.getNetCDFFile();
00169   std::vector<std::string> data_unit_names;
00170   cimglist_for(data,c) data_unit_names.push_back(data_unit_name);
00172   fod.addNetCDFVar(data,DAQdev.channel_name,data_unit_names);
00174   std::string index_name("channel_index");
00175   cimglist_for(data,c) (fod.pNCvars[c])->add_att(index_name.c_str(),DAQdev.channel_index[c]);
00177   std::string range_name("physical_range");
00178   Tdata phys_range[2];
00179   phys_range[0]=phys_range_min;phys_range[1]=phys_range_max;
00180   cimglist_for(data,c) (fod.pNCvars[c])->add_att(range_name.c_str(),2,phys_range);
00181   range_name="physical_range_unit";
00182   cimglist_for(data,c) (fod.pNCvars[c])->add_att(range_name.c_str(),(const char*)phys_range_unit.c_str());
00183   range_name="acquisition_range";
00184   Tacqu acqu_range[2];
00185   acqu_range[0]=acqu_range_min;acqu_range[1]=acqu_range_max;
00186   cimglist_for(data,c) (fod.pNCvars[c])->add_att(range_name.c_str(),2,acqu_range);
00187   range_name="acquisition_range_unit";
00188   cimglist_for(data,c) (fod.pNCvars[c])->add_att(range_name.c_str(),(const char*)acqu_range_unit.c_str());
00191   cimg_library::CImgList<Ttime> store_time(time.size()+1);
00192   store_time[0]=time[0];
00193   cimglist_for(time,c) store_time[c+1]=time[c];
00195   std::vector<std::string> time_var_names;
00196   time_var_names.push_back(dim_names[0]);
00197   cimglist_for(data,c) time_var_names.push_back(DAQdev.channel_name[c]+"__"+dim_names[0]);
00200   std::vector<std::string> time_unit_names(store_time.size(),"second");
00202   fot.addNetCDFVar(store_time,time_var_names,time_unit_names);
00204 //std::cerr<<"create globals\n"<<std::flush;
00206   fp->add_att("sampling_rate", DAQdev.sampling_rate);
00209   fp->add_att("range_id", DAQdev.range_id);
00211 //std::cerr<<"create data\n"<<std::flush;
00213   fod.addNetCDFData(data,0);
00215   fot.addNetCDFData(store_time,0);
00216   return 0;
00217 }
